column1: 1 Nephi 3:7**7**And it came to pass that I
column3: said unto my father: I will go and do the things which the Lord hath commanded
column4: for I know that the Lord giveth no commandments unto the children of men

column1: Alma 3:27**27**For every man receiveth wages of him whom he listeth to obey
column2: and this according to the words of the spirit of prophecy; therefore let it be according to the truth. And thus endeth the fifth year of the reign of the judges.
